description:
Approximate centre point of salt pans along Namibian coastline
Method: Digitised from colour orthophotos Surveyor General (2001 - 2002), Landsat ETM mosaic (1999 - 2002) and old topographic maps
keywords: Oceans | Coastal Processes | Saltwater Intrusion, Namibia, Atlas
name: Namibia: Salt Pans
